analyzed: zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la cang mi gsung pas gnang ngo //

analyzed: khyim bdag gis khyed cag zan gyi phyir byin gyi /

translated: When they did not put it down, the doorkeeper beat them.

original: ku co rab tu che bar gyur pa dang / yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo zhes bya ba skye bo'i tshogs chen po thams cad 'dus par gyur to //🔽khyim bdag drag shul can gyis mi sdug pa de dag mthong nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la @43a *//
analyzed: ku co rab tu che bar gyur pa dang / yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo zhes bya ba skye bo'i tshogs chen po thams cad 'dus par gyur to // khyim bdag drag shul can gyis mi sdug pa de dag mthong nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la @43a *//
translated: A great clamor arose, and all the people of Vaiśālī, men and women, boys and girls, gathered together.

original: 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When the householder Aṅgada saw those unpleasant things, he said to the brahmins and householders of Vaiśālī:

original: shes ldan dag khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / de dag gi khyad par mthong ngam /
analyzed: shes ldan dag khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / de dag gi khyad par mthong ngam /
translated: “Sirs, have you seen the Blessed One, together with the community of disciples, and their differences?”

original: de dag gis smras pa; khyim bdag mthong ngo //🔽des smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa; khyim bdag mthong ngo // des smras pa /
translated: “Householder, we have seen them.”

original: shes ldan dag de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed chen chung la /
analyzed: shes ldan dag de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed chen chung la /
translated: “Sirs, in that case, the Blessed One has few desires,

original: de'i nyan thos dag kyang 'dod chen chung gi /
analyzed: de'i nyan thos dag kyang 'dod chen chung gi /
translated: and his disciples have few desires as well.

original: mu stegs can nyes par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba can 'di dag ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: mu stegs can nyes par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba can 'di dag ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But the tīrthikas, with their poorly explained Dharma and Vinaya, are not like that.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mngon par ma dad pa mang po ni /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mngon par ma dad pa mang po ni /
translated: Then many who had not previously had faith in the Blessed One and his community of disciples

original: mngon par dad par gyur to //
analyzed: mngon par dad par gyur to //
translated: came to have faith.

original: bar ma rnams las kyang kha cig ni /
analyzed: bar ma rnams las kyang kha cig ni /
translated: And some of those who were neutral

original: bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to //
translated: came to have faith in the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas zhabs bkrus te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas zhabs bkrus te /
translated: Then the Blessed One went to the monastery, washed his feet,

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
translated: and sat down on the seat prepared for him in front of the community of monks.

original: bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: When he had sat down, the Blessed One said to the monks,

original: dge slong dag de lta bas na tshod rig pa la phan yon de dang / gzhan dag kyang yod pas de'i phyir dge slong gi gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / shel las byas pa la sogs pa rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong dag de lta bas na tshod rig pa la phan yon de dang / gzhan dag kyang yod pas de'i phyir dge slong gi gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / shel las byas pa la sogs pa rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya ste /
translated: “Monks, since there are these and other benefits to moderation, monks should not eat from precious vessels such as gold, silver, beryl, or crystal.

original: za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If they do, they become guilty of an offense.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / shel las byas pa la sogs pa rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' @43b stsal pa dang / dge slong skyon dang bral ba gzhan dag ci yod pa de dag gi dbang gis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / shel las byas pa la sogs pa rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' @43b stsal pa dang / dge slong skyon dang bral ba gzhan dag ci yod pa de dag gi dbang gis /
translated: The Blessed One had said, “Monks should not eat from precious vessels such as gold, silver, beryl, or crystal.”

original: so so skye bo dag lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas su song ba la /
analyzed: so so skye bo dag lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas su song ba la /
translated: Other monks who were free from faults went to the abodes of gods and nāgas.

original: der de dag zan la bos pa dang / de dag gi khyim na /🔽rang gi bsod nams las grub pa'i gser dang / dngul dag /
analyzed: der de dag zan la bos pa dang / de dag gi khyim na / rang gi bsod nams las grub pa'i gser dang / dngul dag /
translated: There, they were invited to eat.

original: bee d'urya dang / shel gyi snod yod kyi /
analyzed: bee d'urya dang / shel gyi snod yod kyi /
translated: In those houses, there were vessels made of gold, silver, beryl, and crystal that had been created by the merit of the owners.🔽There were no other vessels.

original: gzhan med pas de dag der 'gyod de zan ma zos so //
analyzed: gzhan med pas de dag der 'gyod de zan ma zos so //
translated: The monks felt regret and did not eat.

original: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks told the Blessed One about this situation, and the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Monks,

original: de lta bas na gang du snod gzhan rnyed pa med pa der ni gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / shel la sogs pa'i snod du za bar gnang gi /
analyzed: de lta bas na gang du snod gzhan rnyed pa med pa der ni gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / shel la sogs pa'i snod du za bar gnang gi /
translated: Therefore, if there is no other vessel available, it is permitted to eat from a vessel made of gold, silver, lapis lazuli, crystal, and so on.

original: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
translated: You should not feel guilty about this.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa /🔽nor mang ba /🔽longs spyod che ba /
analyzed: mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa / nor mang ba / longs spyod che ba /
translated: In Śrāvastī there lived a certain householder who was rich,🔽had great wealth,🔽and had abundant possessions,

original: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /🔽rnam thos kyi bu'i ner dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba / rnam thos kyi bu'i ner dang ldan pa /
translated: vast and expansive holdings,🔽and was as wealthy as Vaiśravaṇa.

original: rnam thos kyi bu dang nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des /
analyzed: rnam thos kyi bu dang nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des /
translated: He was a rival of Vaiśravaṇa in wealth.

original: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /🔽de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
analyzed: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas / de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
translated: He took a wife from a family of equal status,

original: dga' bar byed /🔽dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
analyzed: dga' bar byed / dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
translated: and he enjoyed himself, took pleasure, and amused himself with her.

original: de dang rtse bar byed /🔽dga' bar byed /
analyzed: de dang rtse bar byed / dga' bar byed /
translated: He enjoyed himself, took pleasure, and amused himself with her,

original: dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa las /
analyzed: dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa las /
translated: and through his enjoyment, taking pleasure, and amusing himself,

original: dus gzhan zhig na chung ma de la sems can zhugs par gyur to //🔽gang gis nyin mo de sems can zhugs par @44a *//
analyzed: dus gzhan zhig na chung ma de la sems can zhugs par gyur to // gang gis nyin mo de sems can zhugs par @44a *//
translated: Later, his wife became pregnant.🔽On the very day that she became pregnant,

original: gyur ba de nyid kyi nyin mo nas mdangs bzang bar gyur to //
analyzed: gyur ba de nyid kyi nyin mo nas mdangs bzang bar gyur to //
translated: her complexion became radiant.

original: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
analyzed: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
translated: After eight or nine months had passed, she gave birth to a child who was well proportioned,

original: mdzes pa / blta na sdug pa /
analyzed: mdzes pa / blta na sdug pa /
translated: pleasing to the eye, and beautiful,

original: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
translated: with all the major and minor auspicious marks.🔽When the child was born, her house was filled with light like the sun.

original: de btsas pa'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur na mnyan yod kun du khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
analyzed: de btsas pa'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur na mnyan yod kun du khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
translated: All of Śrāvastī said, “A daughter has been born to such-and-such a householder. She is well proportioned,

original: mdzes pa / blta na sdug pa /
analyzed: mdzes pa / blta na sdug pa /
translated: pleasing to the eye, and beautiful,

original: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
translated: with all the major and minor auspicious marks.”

original: de btsas pa de'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to zhes sgra de grags pa dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
analyzed: de btsas pa de'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to zhes sgra de grags pa dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
translated: Many hundreds of thousands of living beings were amazed,

original: khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'dus so //
analyzed: khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'dus so //
translated: and they gathered in the house of that householder.

original: re zhig nas bram ze ltas mkhan zhig yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa de yang ngo //
analyzed: re zhig nas bram ze ltas mkhan zhig yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa de yang ngo //
translated: After some time, a brahman astrologer came from another country.

original: mtshar gyi phyir de nyid du 'dus te /
analyzed: mtshar gyi phyir de nyid du 'dus te /
translated: He also gathered there out of curiosity.

original: des de la phan tshun du bltas nas /
analyzed: des de la phan tshun du bltas nas /
translated: He looked at her back and forth,

original: skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa /
analyzed: skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa /
translated: and said to the crowd of people:

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: Sirs,

original: khyed kyis bu mo 'di mthong ngam /
analyzed: khyed kyis bu mo 'di mthong ngam /
translated: have you seen this girl?

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: They said,🔽We have seen her.

original: mthong ngo // shes ldan dag /
analyzed: mthong ngo // shes ldan dag /
translated: Sirs,

original: bu mo 'di ni ci nas kyang skyes bu lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bu mo 'di ni ci nas kyang skyes bu lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: this girl will enjoy herself with five hundred men at the same time.

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: They said,🔽How is that possible?

original: bram ze / 'di'i gzugs 'di ltar mdzes pa dang sbyar na; 'di ni gdon mi za bar skyes pa lnga brgya dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bram ze / 'di'i gzugs 'di ltar mdzes pa dang sbyar na; 'di ni gdon mi za bar skyes pa lnga brgya dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Brahmin, if you consider her beauty, she will certainly have intercourse with five hundred men.”

original: mnyan yod thams cad du yang khyim bdag gcig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
analyzed: mnyan yod thams cad du yang khyim bdag gcig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
translated: “In Śrāvastī, the son of a certain householder was born with a beautiful body,

original: mdzes pa / blta na sdug @44b pa; yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
analyzed: mdzes pa / blta na sdug @44b pa; yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
translated: good looks, and all the major and minor body parts.

original: de btsas pa de'i tshe de'i khyim de nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: de btsas pa de'i tshe de'i khyim de nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
translated: When he was born, his house became as bright as the light of the sun.

original: de la mtshan mkhan gyis bu mo 'di ni skyes pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par lung bstan to //
analyzed: de la mtshan mkhan gyis bu mo 'di ni skyes pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par lung bstan to //
translated: The astrologers predicted that this girl would have intercourse with five hundred men.”

original: zhes sgra grags nas /
analyzed: zhes sgra grags nas /
translated: This news spread everywhere.

original: gang gis sgra thos pa de yang der 'ongs par gyur to //
analyzed: gang gis sgra thos pa de yang der 'ongs par gyur to //
translated: Anyone who heard it came to see her.

original: zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de btsas pa'i brtsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
analyzed: zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de btsas pa'i brtsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
translated: For twenty-one days they celebrated her birth with a great feast,

original: ming 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: ming 'dogs par byed de /
translated: and then they gave her a name.

original: bu mo 'di ni ming ji skad du gdags /
analyzed: bu mo 'di ni ming ji skad du gdags /
translated: “What name should we give this girl?”

original: nye du dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: nye du dag gis smras pa /
translated: Her relatives said,

original: bu mo 'di btsas pa'i tshe khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur pas /
analyzed: bu mo 'di btsas pa'i tshe khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur pas /
translated: “When this girl was born, the house was filled with light like the sun.

original: de'i phyir bu mo'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bu mo'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so //
translated: Therefore, let us name the girl Suprabhā.🔽”

original: zhes de'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes bya bar btags so //
analyzed: zhes de'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes bya bar btags so //
translated: Thus, she was named Suprabhā.
